title: World Bank cuts India's GDP growth forecast for FY24 to 6.3% in latest Global Economic Prospects report | Mint - Mint
description: World Bank expects India's growth to slow down further to 6.3% in FY2023/24 due to high inflation and rising borrowing costs, with a slight pick-up expected in FY2025/26. India will remain the fastest-growing economy among the largest EMDEs.
